actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-1130.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for a motion to take the bill (H.R. 5172) to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the programs of the National Bureau of Standards for fiscal years 1984 and 1985 and for related purposes, from the Speaker's table and to agree to the Senate amendment.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5172 (National Bureau of Standards funding) and the Senate amendment thereto.

titles.title: A resolution providing for a motion to take the bill (H.R. 5172) to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the programs of the National Bureau of Standards for fiscal years 1984 and 1985 and for related purposes, from the Speaker's table and to agree to the Senate amendment.
